Summary: This hostel was terrific. The hostel setup is more like a motel, which was fun and different. The rooms are also clean, and the bathrooms have all the necessities and then some.  It was great to have an affordable accommodation option so close to Disneyland! I walked from the hostel to Disneyland along one stretch (Harbour Blvd), which only took 15-20 minutes; this was a major convenience!

Summary: We are so glad to know we enjoyed the Facilities, very close to Disneyland walking! Made friends and had an EPIC stay! We hope to see them at Bposhtels again. Location, Cleanliness and Social! Had fun and want to stay again! Happy travels!
